comments.body: Note for the reviewers: This test identifies the forwarding rule used by the LB by IP. Alternatively, I can use the `GetLoadBalancerName()` to find the forwarding rule with the given name. I went with the former because it seemed to be more generic and less implementation dependent, but I could be convinced to just go with the later.
